Reviews.Title: “Perfect location! Clean but basic rooms.”
Reviews.Author: Christopher D
Reviews.Content: lived madrid visiting stayed hotels hostals stay san lorenzo am vacation night madrid international flight etc location perfect heart gay neighborhood close safe clean basic luxury cheap dont breakfast restaurant barcafe corner directly below hostal serves food cheaper bottom line rest thats cheap cheerful san lorenzo perfect

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money but don't expect much, especially from staff”
Reviews.Author: Scott B
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel studying madrid month led look cheap hotel hotel price location thats extremely basic clean wifi weak suggest café breakfast especially lead meet people management whom shouldnt forget hospitality brought friend watch movie computer lead scandal front desk clerk accused basically sleep girl impossible single treated friend prostitute extremely rude friend simple dvd night bad experience disappeared believe maid mentioned management intense talk manager extremely rude instead saying sorry trying solution accused liar etc nonetheless try stay honest hotel youre looking luxury youre seeking location value money youll judged personally step foot

Reviews.Title: “Bring earplugs!”
Reviews.Author: edinburghmonkey12
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights friend basic limited resources choice breakfast wasnt worth eur 200 paid positives location gran via chueca district lots restaurantsbars negatives hotel noisy bars paper thin walls hear people running screaming night hot water wasnt entire day complained pressure low fixed hot water available 30 minutes 1 hour hot water reception told story cold repair pressure system

Reviews.Title: “Basic good location”
Reviews.Author: beciboots
Reviews.Content: agree reviews negative hotel basic pokey inner outer local noise stopped 2am particularly loud towels hard remove outer scratched skin sheet sensitive skin hubby breakfast morning 4euros toast coffee cake orange juice lady served happy pills pain found cafe main shopping street 5 min walk hotel slice toast coffee worth walk walking hotel late daunting near main prostitute outside macdonalds bar feel touristy local cheap pay metro ticket 10 euros head airport paid 35 euros taxi extortionate 5 star paid 5 star clean warm stay budget

Reviews.Title: “Location is good but noisy”
Reviews.Author: DRChurchlands
Reviews.Content: common clean nicely decorated cramped lot noise street shutters windows closed location near gran via metro edge bar party lot noise night disappointing didn’t iron didn’t particularly value money hostal louis xv overlooking calle montera – quieter cramped cheaper

Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: Ximenei
Reviews.Content: hotel located near metro gran via centre madrid stayed 1st floor beside kitchen noises smells unpleasent specially mornings addition didnt view dark towels little rough overall fairly clean worst attitude woman waited breakfast rude impolite rest staff diligent specially javier night concierge manager

Reviews.Title: “Central. Clean. Good location”
Reviews.Author: Rugbysw11
Reviews.Content: arrived booking upgraded lower nearer street noisy graded nice 3 floors balcony door square lots storage clean air conditioning august cope heat ok noisy night late didnt stop sleeping downpoint leaving key reception little people friendly helpful didnt eat nearby gay scene
